title: RECAP — YouTube news, Lizzo, Billie Eilish, Simone Biles and a moose
text:
This week's buzzed-about news and pop culture

Looking for a fast and fun recap of what everybody’s talking about this week?

Look no further than the latest episode of RECAP, with Myah Elliott and her friends.

You can find it right here on the CBC KN YouTube channel. Don’t forget to subscribe!

Here’s what’s on deck this week:

Lizzo reignites the sneaker debate with her Instagram post.

Myah creeps the federal election candidates on Instagram and makes some surprising discoveries about all the party leaders.

Including, what’s the story behind Justin Trudeau’s tattoo?

Sidekick Ethan Berkeley-Garcia dishes on Billie Eilish and Liza Koshy — and what’s up with “the bald guy”?

Plus, two world record-breakers: gymnast Simone Biles and — whoa — that is one ginormous moose!

(Laurence Griffiths/Getty Images, Stephanie Taylor/The Canadian Press)

Want a peek behind the scenes?

Watch Myah and Ethan nail their first take (or not!)
description: YouTube goes comment crazy, Lizzo wants to know about your brain, we creep political IGs and Canada’s moose stands tall again.
